div.div: BASICALLY A BURN BAG FOR YOUR PHONE

div.a: Why Is The Government Afraid Of This iPhone App?

div.div: Two Navy SEALs are bringing world-class encryption to the iPhone, for everything from state secrets to celebrity selfies. But that means it can be used by criminals as well.

li.div: The absolutely insane Jack Bauer-style iPhone app that goes on sale next week buzzfeed.com/tommywilhelm/...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RtTYSs&via=Digg&text=Why Is The Government Afraid Of This iPhone App?

div.div: NSFW

div.a: An Interview With The Most Hated Man On The Internet

div.div: Everyone loves nakedness and most people love getting insight into the life of a stranger, so when Hunter Moore combined the two in 2010 with his now defunct website, isanyoneup.com, he filled a gap in the market that hundreds of thousands of people had apparently been desperately looking for.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QY3NdN&via=Digg&text=An Interview With The Most Hated Man On The Internet

div.div: GET HIGH LIKE AN EGYPTIAN

div.a: 12 Drugs From Ancient Cultures And Where To Get Them

div.div: Despite what you might have thought when you were 15, you didn’t discover drugs. Humans have consumed organic substances for their various effects for millennia.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLdEGw&via=Digg&text=12 Drugs From Ancient Cultures And Where To Get Them

div.div: LEAVES NOTHING TO THE IMAGINATION

div.a: iPad Mini Mockups Go Close Range

div.div: We are getting a very close look at these models supposedly based on the real deal.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RLB5ML&via=Digg&text=iPad Mini Mockups Go Close Range

div.div: CAN'T EVEN IMAGINE THE DMs

div.a: News Station Confuses Man's Twitter Feed With A Convicted Rapist's

div.div: "This'll be a fun day!"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R3JQ1W&via=Digg&text=News Station Confuses Man's Twitter Feed With A Convicted Rapist's

div.div: AWKWARD

div.a: Why Do We Behave So Oddly In Elevators?

div.div: Many of us use them several times a day without really noticing. And yet the way we behave in lifts, or elevators as they are known in the US, reveals a hidden anxiety.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RMd20g&via=Digg&text=Why Do We Behave So Oddly In Elevators?

div.div: WORSE THAN YOUR SCHOOL PORTRAIT

div.a: Photoshop Fail Leaves Girl With An Extra Eye

div.div: A Swedish photography company called Skolfoto Norden received some embarrassing press this week after a girl discovered that she had three eyes in the official class portrait it shot.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VLKOWw&via=Digg&text=Photoshop Fail Leaves Girl With An Extra Eye

div.div: THE OPPOSITE OF COMMENT SECTIONS

div.a: Happiness Machine Captures Happy Thoughts From The Web & Prints Them

div.div: When the big black button is pressed, it prints random thoughts by people across the web who mention the word “happy.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VK0nOy&via=Digg&text=Happiness Machine Captures Happy Thoughts From The Web & Prints Them

div.div: FODDER FOR WORST ORIENTATIONS EVER

div.a: 'Hail To The IBM' And Other Corporate Anthems To Sing Along To

div.div: Corporate anthems – not to be confused with commercial jingles — hearken to the era of the “company man,” when a corporation was as much caretaker as employer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RuI5eR&via=Digg&text='Hail To The IBM' And Other Corporate Anthems To Sing Along To

div.div: SPACE

div.a: That Smooth SpaceX Launch? Turns Out One Of The Engines Came Apart

div.div: Approximately one minute and 19 seconds into last night’s launch, the Falcon 9 rocket detected an anomaly on one first stage engine.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UNxrR3&via=Digg&text=That Smooth SpaceX Launch? Turns Out One Of The Engines Came Apart

div.div: COMICS

div.a: Comic Book Characters Who Should Have Their Own TV Show

div.div: If you could choose any comic book character to get their own series, who would it be?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SMVeVl&via=Digg&text=Comic Book Characters Who Should Have Their Own TV Show

div.div: AND DON'T FEED THE CITIZENS AFTER MIDNIGHT

div.a: Detroit Police To Visitors: ‘Enter At Your Own Risk’

div.div: The Detroit Police Officers Association held an “Enter At Your Own Risk” rally Saturday, warning visitors to the Motor City of what they say is a troubling paradox: Detroit is America’s most violent city and its dwindling police force is overworked and underpaid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R9SrjU&via=Digg&text=Detroit Police To Visitors: ‘Enter At Your Own Risk’

div.div: INFOGRAPHIC
If your PIN is "1 2 3 4" you've got a problem.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RauoVj&via=Digg&text=How Safe Is Your PIN?

div.div: SEEMS LIKE A FAIR TRADE

div.a: Cheated-On Dude Sells Radiohead Tickets, Gets Aaron Paul

div.div: Aaron Paul’s now making it his mission to hang out with this dude, whoever he is.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rdp14m&via=Digg&text=Cheated-On Dude Sells Radiohead Tickets, Gets Aaron Paul

div.div: BOOM

div.a: This Explosion Of A Natural Gas Tanker Is Seriously Shocking

div.div: Watch until the end.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/QRsFUf&via=Digg&text=This Explosion Of A Natural Gas Tanker Is Seriously Shocking

div.div: MOSTLY UP TO HER GENES
Possibly the last person on the planet who knew the taste of the air in 1880 has died.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OlR9F6&via=Digg&text=How Did Woman Live To 132?

div.div: AWESOME VISUALIZATIONS
What happens when midnight comes around again?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ra01Oz&via=Digg&text=History Of Earth In 24-Hour Clock

div.div: THEY DIDN'T HAVE INSTAGRAM ANYWAYS

div.a: Cameras In Phones Are Now Better Than Compact Cameras From 5 Years Ago

div.div: A few weeks ago, we casually remarked that the best cameraphones today can probably snap better photos than top-of-the-line compact cameras from over a decade ago. Turns out that it’s true.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXpqfC&via=Digg&text=Cameras In Phones Are Now Better Than Compact Cameras From 5 Years Ago

div.div: APPLE MAPS DISAGREES; SHOULD BE A BLOB

div.a: Bing Map Shows CIA's Secret Bin Laden Compound Mock-Up

div.div: A satellite image of the training facility located in Perquimans County, N.C. was captured by Microsoft's Bing search as it was ramping up its satellite data.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TeIEbW&via=Digg&text=Bing Map Shows CIA's Secret Bin Laden Compound Mock-Up

div.div: GET 'EM WHILE THEY'RE YOUNG
Maily is an email client designed for children in mind.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OQt6jf&via=Digg&text=An Email App For Children

div.div: DISLIKE

div.a: Here's What Facebook's New 'Want' Button Will Look Like

div.div: People are going crazy over the announcement that Facebook, in a continued effort to woo advertisers since the IPO, announced that it's testing a "Want" button.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SQ2p9c&via=Digg&text=Here's What Facebook's New 'Want' Button Will Look Like
